column1: Little Goat Diner////Clearly not skimping on complexity or calories in any way
column2: desserts would prove equally interesting to the main plates and whether one opts for a simple chocolate chip cookie
column5: or defiantly excellent savory milkshake each one was resoundingly good - the entire meal easily warranting a return visit in the future and
column6: despite the fact that I've never seen a single episode of Top Chef
column7: assuring me that Chef Izard deserves every bit of the praise and success that has come her way.
